bibl.title: Who Practised Love-Magic in Classical Antiquity and in the Late Roman World?
bibl.note: Introduction. - The testimony of the magical papyri. - At what women were erotic spells in the formularies directed? - Egyptian defixiones. - Erotic defixiones outside Egypt. - Conclusion. - Addendum: Sexual differentiation in the use of erotic spells.
bibl.seg: DICKIE Matthew W., Who Practised Love-Magic in Classical Antiquity and in the Late Roman World?

Introduction. - The testimony of the magical papyri. - At what women were erotic spells in the formularies directed? - Egyptian defixiones. - Erotic defixiones outside Egypt. - Conclusion. - Addendum: Sexual differentiation in the use of erotic spells.
